olac-archive.location: Department of Linguistics, The LINGUIST List, Indiana University, 111 N Bryan Ave, Bloomington, Indiana, USA
olac-archive.synopsis: The GORILLA Archive contains speech and language resources for various languages.
olac-archive.access: Access to web based content is open. Access to original materials is open.

olac:olac.dc:title: YID_2006_005.wav
olac:olac.dc:subject: Yiddish Speech Corpus
Yiddish
olac:olac.dc:description: This recording was downloaded as an .mp3 from the Yiddish Book Center (http://www.yiddishbookcenter.org/), and is the first of three parts in the audiobook Oyf Di Felder Fun Treblinke. It was converted to .wav format, time-aligned, and annotated at LINGUIST List using ELAN (see related file YID_2006_005.eaf). This is part of a time-aligned speech corpus to train Forced Alignment tools and speech recognition systems for Yiddish.

olac:olac.dc:title: YID_2006_005.eaf
olac:olac.dc:subject: Yiddish Speech Corpus
Yiddish
olac:olac.dc:description: This is an xml file containing annotation of YID_2006_005.wav. The annotation was generated using the ELAN Linguistic Annotator Version 4.9.4 (https://tla.mpi.nl/tools/tla-tools/elan/). This is part of a time-aligned speech corpus to train Forced Alignment tools and speech recognition systems for Yiddish.

olac:olac.dc:title: YID_199207_008.wav
olac:olac.dc:subject: Yiddish Speech Corpus
Yiddish
olac:olac.dc:description: This recording was recorded for the Yiddish Book Center (http://www.yiddishbookcenter.org), and downloaded as an .mp3 from The Internet Archive (https://archive.org/details/276I.L.PeretzHakhnosesKaleAContributionForAWedding.ReadByLeibTencer). It was converted to .wav format and annotated at LINGUIST List using ELAN (see related file YID_199207_008.eaf). This is part of a time-aligned speech corpus to train Forced Alignment tools and speech recognition systems for Yiddish.
